entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 11:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 7.7°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of drizzle overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 10:38 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy and 40 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:38 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 10:38 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low 6. Forecast issued 10:38 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
